meta.title: Shenzhen Shenye Jinzhan Materials Supply Co., Ltd. - Service Center
meta.description: One-Stop Supply Chain Solutions for Research Procurement

service1.title: Import/Export Agency Services
service1.description: We have provided import/export agency services for 200+ scientific research enterprises and institutions to date.
service1.item2: Customs declaration, inspection, and on-site inspection

service2.title: Supply Chain Financing
service2.description: Our supply chain financing services have provided over 500 million in credit support to customers.
service2.item1: Bill purchase and letter of credit

service3.title: Import/Export Tax Consulting
service3.description: Our import/export tax consulting services have saved customers over 50 million in taxes, effectively reducing tax costs and releasing financial vitality for enterprises.

service4.title: Integrated Logistics Services
service4.description: Through efficient full-chain operations, our integrated logistics services have reduced cross-border cargo clearance time by 30%, improving supply chain turnover efficiency for customers.
service4.item2: Shenzhen-Hong Kong warehousing, bulk packing and distribution
service4.item3: Transit customs clearance, express, and bonded services
service4.item4: Shenzhen-Hong Kong terminal pickup and payment collection

service5.title: Offshore Outsourcing & Value-Added Services
service5.description: Our offshore outsourcing and value-added services have helped 200+ customers mitigate cross-border business risks, achieving a 95% compliant operation rate.

service6.title: Pre-Bid Consulting
service6.description: Our pre-bid consulting services have provided professional support to 100+ procurement units, improving bid compliance by 90%+ and reducing procurement cycles by 20% on average.
service6.item0: Bid policy interpretation and compliance guidance
service6.item2: Custom bid scheme design and process planning
service6.item3: Procurement budget optimization and cost control recommendations
